name: Dash Lamb
description:
Overview:

Dash Lamb is a short single-screen platformer.
Dash to avoid the darkness below,
while struggling to reach The End of the tale.

Features:

  • Free to play
  • Simple gameplay loop
  • Tight single-action control scheme
  • Hyper stylized 8-bit (1-bit) art
  • Mysterious narrative

Fire:

In a kingdom of darkness, a lamb struggles.

Her horns, sparking fire where she goes.

"Don't Worry"
"I'm here for you."
